entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 33.
